OrgName.entry: UNIVERSITY OF SHEFFIELD ENGLISH LANGUAGE TEACHING CENTRE

Desc.entry: Teaches Academic English and Academic Business English to students wishing to go on to study at university. Also runs summer courses in General English, Academic English and Academic Business English. Also offers tailor made courses in English language. Runs occasional free courses in English taught by trainee teachers for intermediate level students, check website for details http://www.shef.ac.uk/tesol/free.
